Smart Shortcut Key JavaScript Library
  • GitHub
Display List Of Shortcut Keys

1

Press shift key for 2 seconds. A small popup will be display at bottom right corner. The popup will display list fo already created shortcut keys
Create New Shortcut Key

2

  1. Press alt key (keep pressed) and click the element from page with mouse.
  2. A modal pop will be opened. Enter a meaning full name to the shortcut key. By default name will be populated with element label.
  3. Enter a letter from key board which will be the shortcut key for that action (suppose you enter l letter for login)
  4. Click Save
  5. Successful message will be displayed
  6. Close the modal on click of Done button
Use the Shortcut Key to trigger the action

3

Press Alt key + l (which you have created the at step 2). Login modal will be opened
